narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This pre-license inspection #1 for a Class "A" license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant. 
Microchipping as a method of identification has been approved. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act. 
The appropriate license fee must be sent to the following address: 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B., MS 3W11
Fort Collin, CO 80526
